summary.span: 是 基类的 WPF 框架级别的实现和扩展。

span.span: is the WPF framework-level implementation and expansion of the base class.

summary.span: 增加了针对下列各项的支持：附加输入 API（包括工具提示和上下文菜单）、演示图板、用于数据绑定的数据上下文、格式支持和逻辑树帮助程序 API。

span.span: adds support for additional input APIs (including tooltips and context menus), storyboards, data context for data binding, styles support, and logical tree helper APIs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 未定义其自己的呈现行为;实例化实际在代码或标记中的类实例是可能的但显示在中为 nothing[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。 does not yet define its own rendering behavior; instantiating an actual class instance in code or markup is possible but displays nothing in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] application [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. 呈现逻辑必须采取的类通过提供子元素作为其内容模型的一部分或在派生类。Rendering logic must be provided by classes that take child elements as part of their content model, or in derived classes. 有意与多个相同[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]作为。 deliberately parallels many of the same [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] as . 请注意，某些[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上找到不会等效。Note that certain [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] found on will not have a equivalent. 多个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]是的功能，如布局或几何图形表示的不相关的。Several of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] are for functionality such as geometry representation or layout, which are not relevant for a . 大部分现有派生的类将位于命名空间。The majority of existing derived classes will be found in the namespace. 许多这些派生类实现流文档模型的元素。Many of these derived classes implement elements for the flow document model. 某些派生的类，如具有某些控件类似的功能，但派生自以便类似于控件的元素仍然可以参与流文档模型。Certain derived classes such as have some control-like functionality, but are derived from such that the control-like elements can still participate in the flow document model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在另一个进程循环访问的逻辑树时调用，此方法会引发异常。This method can throw an exception if called at a time when the logical tree is being iterated by another process. 大多数派生的类公开负责包容的专用的集合 (例如，上类;上类)。Most derived classes expose dedicated collections that are responsible for containment (for example, on the class; on the class). 通常可以避免任何需要直接处理逻辑树，如果你改为派生自这些类。You can typically avoid any need to manipulate the logical tree directly if you derive from these classes instead. 使用内容的元素的逻辑树是一个高级的方案，可能需要一个专用的分析器或一个专用充当父呈现元素 （内容主机）。Working with the logical tree for content elements is an advanced scenario that may require a specialized parser or a specialized that acts as the parent rendering element (content host). 有关如何使用和，请参阅[WPF 中的树](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)。For more information about how to use and , see [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不使用的签名`isControllable`，参数，或指定该参数时， `false`，动画与关联的时间线时钟到达"填充"期时，就会立即删除。For the signatures that do not use the `isControllable`, parameter, or when that parameter is specified `false`, the timeline clocks associated with the animation are removed as soon as it reaches the "Fill" period. 因此，在动画运行一次后将不能是重启。Therefore the animation cannot be restarted after being run once. 请注意，控制动画还要求情节提要，是命名，或者在代码中对实例的可访问性。Note that controlling an animation also requires that the storyboard be named or accessible as an instance in code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不使用的签名`isControllable`，参数，或指定该参数时， `false`，动画与关联的时间线时钟到达"填充"期时，就会立即删除。For the signatures that do not use the `isControllable`, parameter, or when that parameter is specified `false`, the timeline clocks associated with the animation are removed as soon as it reaches the "Fill" period. 因此，在动画运行一次后将不能是重启。Therefore the animation cannot be restarted after being run once. 请注意，控制动画还要求情节提要，是命名，或者在代码中对实例的可访问性。Note that controlling an animation also requires that the storyboard be named or accessible as an instance in code. ## 使用使用Using the Compose HandoffBehavior 当你将， ，或到通过使用属性 、 任何以前与该属性关联的对象可继续使用系统资源; 计时系统将执行不自动删除时钟。When you apply a , , or to a property by using the , any objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove the clocks automatically. 若要避免性能问题时通过使用应用大量的时钟，完成后，应从属性的基值移除组合时钟。To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks by using , you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete. 有多种方法来移除时钟：There are several ways to remove a clock: - 若要从属性中移除所有时钟，请使用或动画对象的方法。To remove all clocks from a property, use the or method of the animated object. 指定正进行动画处理的第一个参数的属性和`null`为第二个。Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second. 这从属性中移除所有动画时钟。This removes all animation clocks from the property. - 若要删除特定时钟的列表，从使用属性检索，然后调用方法。To remove a specific from a list of clocks, use the property of the to retrieve a , then call the method of the . 这通常是时钟的事件处理程序。This is typically done in the event handler for a clock. 请注意，仅根时钟可以受;属性子时钟返回`null`。Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a ; the property of a child clock returns `null`. 另请注意，如果时钟的有效持续时间都是永久性的则不会引发事件。Note also that the event is not raised if the effective duration of the clock is forever. 在这种情况下，用户必须确定何时调用。In that case, the user must determine when to call . 此动画问题主要出现在生存期较长的对象上。This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime. 一个对象进行垃圾回收，其时钟还断开连接，并垃圾收集。When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected. 有关时钟对象的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以用于验证对象的多个属性的值。A can be used to validate the values of multiple properties of an object. 例如，假设应用程序提示用户输入地址，然后填充类型的对象`Address`，其中具有属性`Street`， `City`， `ZipCode`，和`Country`，使用值的用户提供。For example, suppose that an application prompts the user to enter an address and then populates an object of type `Address`, which has the properties `Street`, `City`, `ZipCode`, and `Country`, with the values that the user provided. 应用程序具有包含四个面板控件，其中每个绑定到对象的属性之一。The application has a panel that contains four controls, each of which is bound to one of the object’s properties. 你可以使用中验证`Address`对象。You can use a in a to validate the `Address` object. 例如，可确保邮政编码的有效地址的国家/地区。For example, the can ensure that the zip code is valid for the country of the address. 子元素继承从其父元素，就像使用任何其他可继承的属性。Child elements inherit the from their parent elements, just as with any other inheritable property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为**true**Metadata properties set to **true**||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取消关闭上下文菜单，事件的处理程序应将其标记为已处理。To suppress closing context menus, handlers of the event should mark it as handled. 若要将此事件用作样式，则必须引用基础服务的事件标识符：To use this event as an in a style, you must reference the underlying service event identifier: [!code-xaml[CorePseudocode#FEContextMenuClosing](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/pseudocode.xaml#fecontextmenuclosing)] (此用法是必需的因为上的事件实现，公开基础的服务事件不会不会正确映射在触发器中使用的标识符)。(This usage is required because the event implementation on that exposes the underlying service event does not correctly map the identifier for use in triggers). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例实现一个处理程序，在已命名区域更改光标`DisplayArea`（未显示）。The following example implements a handler that changes the cursor over a named region `DisplayArea` (not shown). 注释可指示使用情况，但事实上，此示例将是相同如果`DisplayArea`已。The comment hints at a usage, but in fact this sample would be identical if `DisplayArea` were a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由的事件时创建事件标识符对象 (请参阅)，然后可以使用添加类处理程序 (请参阅)。Event identifier objects are created when routed events are registered (see ) and can then be used to add class handlers (see ). 标识符对象包含标识名称、 所有者类型、 处理程序类型、 路由策略和添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。Identifier objects contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and a utility method for adding owners for the event.

span.span: Occurs when any context menu on the element is opened.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要手动打开上下文菜单，事件的处理程序应将相关的事件标记为已处理。To manually open context menus, handlers of the events should mark the relevant event as handled. 否则为的现有值属性将用于自动打开上下文菜单。Otherwise, the existing value of the property will be used to automatically open a context menu. 将标记处理的事件可有效地取消的默认操作，并且可重置的值的机会属性，然后打开新。Marking the event handled will effectively cancel the default action, and could be an opportunity to reset the value of the property and then open the new . 但是，没有应该注意的计时问题。However, there is a timing issue you should be aware of. 若要完全替换通过上下文菜单处理程序中，初始上下文菜单不能为 null / 空。In order to completely replace the context menu through a handler, the initial context menu must not be null / empty. 或者，你可能需要处理该事件，然后手动打开新的上下文菜单。Alternatively, you might need to handle the event and then manually open a new context menu. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 处理 ContextMenuOpening 事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-handle-the-contextmenuopening-event.md)。For details, see [How to: Handle the ContextMenuOpening Event](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-handle-the-contextmenuopening-event.md). 若要将此事件用作样式，则必须引用基础服务的事件标识符：To use this event as an in a style, you must reference the underlying service event identifier: [!code-xaml[CorePseudocode#FEContextMenuOpening](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/pseudocode.xaml#fecontextmenuopening)] (此用法是必需的因为上的事件实现，公开基础的服务事件不会不会正确映射在触发器中使用的标识符)。(This usage is required because the event implementation on that exposes the underlying service event does not correctly map the identifier for use in triggers). ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]处理器依赖于针对类型转换类来计算该字符串。When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor relies on type conversion for the class to evaluate the string. 所提供的字符串的计算结果应为值。The provided string should evaluate to a value. 有关详细信息，请参阅。See for details. 是否建立此属性的光标将或将不会显示在鼠标指针位于此元素时也是依赖于的值属性。Whether the cursor as established by this property will or will not display when the mouse pointer is over this element is also dependent on the value of the property. 此外，与事件相关的注意事项，如活动拖动、 鼠标捕获、 文本编辑控件，以此类推内, 模式还将影响光标，并且其优先级高于此属性中指定的值。Also, event-related considerations such as an active drag, mouse capture, text editing modes within controls, and so on, will also affect the cursor with higher priority than the value you specify in this property. 若要恢复的此属性设置为最终的默认行为，请将其设置为`null`试。To revert the behavior of setting this property to the eventual default, set it to `null` again. `null`默认的真正含义的实际光标值确定此处延迟，并且应从其他地方获取。The `null` default really means that determination of the practical cursor value is deferred here and should be obtained from elsewhere. 如果不存在以编程方式值来自任何源的默认光标通过[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序将是一个箭头。If presented with no programmatic values from any source, the default cursor over a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] application will be an arrow. 每个移动的鼠标悬停[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序将引发事件。Each movement of the mouse over a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] application raises a event. 该事件将冒泡，并且在路由任何元素都有机会对事件进行处理，并将光标通过此事件的自变量的值设置。The event bubbles, and any element along the route has the opportunity to handle the event and to set the value of the cursor via the arguments of this event. 如果发生这种情况，则表明事件进行处理，并且参数中有更改的值将优先于的值属性在任何级别，除非设置。If that happens, the fact that the event is handled and has a changed value in the arguments takes precedence over the value of the property at any level, unless is set. 如果不创建自定义光标，通常你设置此属性与静态属性值的类。If not creating a custom cursor, typically you set this property to a static property value of the class. 设置在部分信任环境中未启用为自定义值。Setting the to a custom value is not enabled in partial trust. 有关自定义的游标的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information on custom cursors, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## summary.span: 获取或设置元素参与数据绑定时的数据上下文。

span.span: Gets or sets the data context for an element when it participates in data binding.

value.span: 要用作数据上下文的对象。

span.span: The object to use as data context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks *数据上下文*是使元素可以信息从其父元素继承有关用于绑定，以及如路径绑定的其他特征的绑定源的概念。*Data context* is a concept that allows elements to inherit information from their parent elements about the binding source that is used for binding, as well as other characteristics of the binding such as the path. 可以直接设置数据上下文[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]对象，并且将绑定到该对象的属性计算。Data context can be set directly to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object, with the bindings evaluating to properties of that object. 或者，可以设置的数据上下文为对象。Alternatively, you can set the data context to a object. 此依赖属性继承属性值。This dependency property inherits property values. 如果有任何其他值的子元素建立通过本地值或样式，属性系统将设置此值为分配有此值最接近的父元素的值。If there are child elements with no other value for established through local values or styles, the property system will set the value to be the value of the nearest parent element with this value assigned. 或者，你可以使用的以下属性之一类显式指定绑定源： ， ，或。Alternatively, you can use one of the following properties of the class to specify the binding source explicitly: , , or . 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 指定绑定源](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md)。For more information, see [How to: Specify the Binding Source](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md). 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，通常设置为声明。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], is most commonly set to as a declaration. 你可以使用属性元素语法或特性语法。You can use either property element syntax or attribute syntax. 特性语法在此页上的示例所示。Attribute syntax is shown in the example on this page. 你还可以设置在代码中。You can also set in code. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 当此元素的数据上下文更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when this element's data context changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据上下文和数据绑定的说明，请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For an explanation of data contexts and data binding, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). > [!IMPORTANT] > 当元素的可能受影响的更改，此元素上的所有数据绑定属性。When an element's changes, all data-bound properties on this element are potentially affected. 这适用于任何是继承的数据上下文，当前元素的子代元素的元素以及当前元素本身。This applies to any elements that are descendant elements of the current element, which inherit the data context, and also the current element itself. 此类的所有绑定都重新都解释新以反映在绑定中的新值。All such bindings re-interpret the new to reflect the new value in bindings. 有关相对于引发这些更改的顺序不能保证事件。There is no guarantee made about the order of these changes relative to the raising of the event. 事件发生后, 或在任意组合，事件之前, 可以发生的更改。The changes can occur before the event, after the event, or in any mixture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性通常不通过其直接 setter 的任何设置。This property is typically not set through any of its direct setters. 相反，每次创建新的子类覆盖此依赖项属性的特定类型的元数据。Instead, you override the type-specific metadata of this dependency property every time you create a new subclass. 当你子类，请调用方法依据在控件子类的静态构造函数内的标识符。When you subclass, call the method against the identifier, within the static constructor of the control subclass. 例如，例如内联类实际上已超出重写很少实现其静态构造函数，并公开多个实例构造函数中的元数据。For instance, an inline class such as actually has very little implementation beyond overriding the metadata in its static constructor, and exposing several instance constructors. 元素被事实标记提升属性实现中设置的默认值所引用的主题样式到`typeof(Bold)`。The fact that elements surrounded by the tag gain a property of is implemented within the theme style that was referenced by setting the default value of to `typeof(Bold)`. 如果你希望元素或控件，以防出现故意不使用主题样式，设置属性`true`。If you want your element or control to deliberately not use theme styles, set the property to `true`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此方法以提供您的元素初始化期间加载过程的元素时应执行的特殊处理。Implement this method to provide special handling that should occur when your element is initialized during the element loading process. 您的实现应调用基实现，因为基 （默认） 实现设置某些内部标志来跟踪初始化。Your implementation should call the base implementation, because the base (default) implementation sets some internal flags to keep track of initialization. 如果之前已调用，基实现将引发事件。If was previously called, the base implementation will raise the event. 否则为如果未调用或它无法确定是否已调用，则不会引发该事件。Otherwise, if was not called or it could not be determined whether was called, the event is not raised.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象允许自定义此元素在捕获到键盘焦点时要应用于此元素的外观、效果或其他样式特征。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that enables customization of appearance, effects, or other style characteristics that will apply to this element when it captures keyboard focus.

value.span: 要应用于焦点的所需样式。

span.span: The desired style to apply on focus.

value.span: 该依赖项属性中声明的默认值是一个空的静态 。

span.span: The default value as declared in the dependency property is an empty static .

value.span: 但是，运行时的有效值通常是（但并非总是）控件的主题支持所提供的样式。

span.span: However, the effective value at run time is often (but not always) a style as supplied by theme support for controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]、 样式几乎始终定义为资源，而不是作为元素，内联和资源通常是作为引用。When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], styles are almost always defined as a resource, rather than inline as an element, and that resource is usually referenced as a . 请注意，此属性会影响视觉外观，但不会报告此元数据中。Note that this property affects visual appearance but does not report so in metadata. 这是因为可视外观更改是事件驱动的和可能不适用于在所有时间，并因此通常不应该报告元数据中的任何 visual 或布局信息。This is because the visual appearance change is event-driven and may not apply at all times, and thus should not generally report any visual or layout information in metadata. 从概念上讲，应用于控件的焦点的可视行为应为连贯从一个元素到另一个元素。Conceptually, the visual behavior of focus applied to a control should be coherent from element to element. 最合理的方法，来强制执行一致性是仅更改焦点视觉样式，如果你创建的整个主题。The most sensible way to enforce coherence is to only change the focus visual style if you are composing an entire theme. 在单个样式上，而不是主题的一部分设置此属性不是预期的用法的此属性，因为它可能会导致混乱的用户体验与键盘焦点有关。Setting this property on individual styles and not as part of a theme is not the intended usage of this property, because it may lead to a confusing user experience regarding keyboard focus. 如果你想为以防出现故意不连贯整个主题的特定元素的行为，较好的做法是使用触发器样式中的单个输入的状态属性，如或，从而不一种方法中执行此操作直观地干扰任何现有的焦点视觉样式。If you are intending element-specific behavior that is deliberately not coherent across a theme, a much better approach is to use triggers in styles for individual input state properties, such as or , and to do so in a way that does not visually interfere with any existing focus visual style. 有关详细信息的设计意图及替代焦点属性，请参阅[样式的焦点在控件和 FocusVisualStyle](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/styling-for-focus-in-controls-and-focusvisualstyle.md)。For more information on the design intention of and alternative focus properties, see [Styling for Focus in Controls, and FocusVisualStyle](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/styling-for-focus-in-controls-and-focusvisualstyle.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

from code is not common, because if you have the appropriate reference in code already, you can just call methods and properties on the element reference and do not generally need the . 例外情况是字符串具有某些重载的含义，例如有用中显示该名称是否[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。An exception is if the string has some overloaded meaning, for instance if it is useful to display that name in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 设置代码中如果原始已从标记中的设置也不建议，并且更改该属性不会更改对象引用。Setting a from code if the original was set from markup is also not recommended, and changing the property will not change the object reference. 仅当基础名称范围显式创建期间创建此类对象引用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]加载。Such object references are created only when the underlying namescopes are explicitly created during [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] loading. 你必须明确调用以进行有效的更改上已加载的元素的属性。You must specifically call to make an effective change on the property of an already loaded element. 一个值得一提设置情况从代码很重要的命名元素演示图板将针对运行。One notable case where setting from code is important is for naming elements that storyboards will run against. the Example section, or [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md). 设置从代码具有有限的应用程序，但按名称查找元素并更常用，尤其是在你采用一种导航模型到应用程序重新加载页面，其中的运行时代码不一定的代码隐藏相应的页。Setting from not necessarily the code-behind of that respective page. 实用工具方法，这是可从任何，可以找到任何元素中该元素的逻辑树以递归方式。The utility method , which is available from any , can find any element by in that element's logical tree recursively. 也可以使用静态方法，其还会作为自变量的字符串。Or you can use the static method of , which also takes the string as an argument. 常用根元素 (，例如) 实现的接口。Commonly used root elements (, for example) implement the remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 继承中的中间类已经实现此方法的情况下，你仍应调用基实现。You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 此方法的目的是某种程度上类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 它提供了一种用而不是一个实例处理程序的类处理程序的派生类中对匹配事件进行处理。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 因为路由的事件可能由一个子元素，不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序引发，On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的实现将需要考虑事件参数的源属性 （和不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下）。Therefore, your implementation will have to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子类可以选择在路由过程中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一个可能的方案是事件的自变量，以防出现故意将事件标记为已处理以缩短路由。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled to shorten the route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 继承中的中间类已经实现此方法的情况下，你仍应调用 base （）。You should still call base() in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 此方法的目的是某种程度上类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 它提供了一种用而不是一个实例处理程序的类处理程序的派生类中对匹配事件进行处理。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为路由的事件可能遭到一个子元素，不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序，以便您的实现将需要采取的事件自变量的源引发将属性转换为帐户 （和不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下）。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will have to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子类可以选择在路由过程中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一个可能的方案是事件的自变量，以防出现故意将事件标记为已处理以缩短路由。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled to shorten the route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不应通常检测属性更改或失效。This method is not intended to generally detect property changes or invalidations. 它而被旨在用于修改常规失效模式如果查阅宽分类的属性已知的某些信息。It is instead intended for modifications of the general invalidation pattern if certain information is known about wide classifications of properties. 调用此方法可能很多时候一个对象的生命周期内。This method is potentially invoked many times during the life of an object. 因此，你可以实现更好的性能，如果重写特定属性的元数据，然后将附加或为各个属性的函数。Therefore, you can achieve better performance if you override the metadata of specific properties and then attach or functions for individual properties. 但是，如果你将使用此方法包括大量的值相关的依赖项属性，或如果它包括逻辑，如呈现行为，必须重新运行多个相关属性失效的情况。However, you would use this method if a includes a significant number of value-interrelated dependency properties, or if it includes logic such as rendering behavior that must be rerun for several related cases of property invalidations. 请注意，没有具有相同名称`OnPropertyChanged`用不同的签名的方法 (该参数类型是)，可能出现在多个类。Note that there is an identically named `OnPropertyChanged` method with a different signature (the parameter type is ) that can appear on a number of classes. `OnPropertyChanged`用于数据对象通知，并且是协定的一部分。That `OnPropertyChanged` is used for data object notifications, and is part of the contract for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 继承中的中间类已经实现此方法的情况下，你仍应调用 base （）。You should still call base() in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 此方法的目的是某种程度上类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 它提供了一种用而不是一个实例处理程序的类处理程序的派生类中对匹配事件进行处理。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为路由的事件可能遭到一个子元素，不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序，以便您的实现将需要采取的事件自变量的源引发将属性转换为帐户 （和不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下）。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will have to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子类可以选择在路由过程中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一个可能的方案是事件的自变量，以防出现故意将事件标记为已处理以缩短路由。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled to shorten the route.

On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为路由的事件可能遭到一个子元素，不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序，以便您的实现将需要采取的事件自变量的源引发将属性转换为帐户 （和不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下）。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子类可以选择在路由过程中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一个可能的方案是事件的自变量，以防出现故意将事件标记为已处理以缩短路由。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled to shorten the route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，具体取决于应用程序功能，可能发生更改的元素的逻辑父级，并且此属性的值保持将不会反映所做的更改。Note that the logical parent of an element can potentially change depending on your application functionality, and keeping the value of this property will not reflect that change. 你需要它之前，你通常应获取的值。You typically should get the value immediately before you need it. 请参阅[WPF 中的树](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)有关遍历其中采取针对元素发现这种方法合适的逻辑树和方案的详细信息。See [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md) for more information about traversing logical trees, and the scenarios where taking this approach towards element discovery is appropriate. 属性系统将可能重新计算此元素的所有属性值时父级，因为某些属性继承值通过逻辑树。The property system will potentially recalculate all property values of an element when it is reparented, because some properties inherit values through the logical tree. 适用于元素是父级，还可以更改绑定。The that applies for bindings can also change when elements are reparented. 更改元素的父通常只是对集合的操作，通过使用专用添加或删除方法，或通过设置的元素的内容属性。Changing an element's parent is typically only done through manipulation of collections, by using dedicated add or remove methods, or through setting content properties of elements. 使用最典型的情形属性是获得的引用，然后获取各种从父属性值。The most typical scenario for using the property is to obtain a reference and then get various property values from the parent. 对于模板，模板的最终将`null`。For templates, the of the template eventually will be `null`. 若要忽略这一点并扩展到实际将应用的模板的逻辑树，请使用。To get past this point and extend into the logical tree where the template is actually applied, use . ## Examples 下面的示例检查以查看是否的是否属于特定类型。The following example checks to see whether the of a is of a particular type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是调用的便捷方法。This method is a convenience method for calling . 该实现将检查连续的父元素，直到它找到适用实现，它可以通过查找元素实现。The implementation will check successive parent elements until it finds the applicable implementation, which is found by finding an element that implements . 有关名称范围的详细信息，请参阅[WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md)。For more information about namescopes, see [WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md). 调用为正确挂钩的应用程序时在代码中创建动画演示图板是必需的。Calling is necessary in order to correctly hook up animation storyboards for applications when created in code. 这是因为其中一个主要情节提要属性， ，而不是能够充分目标元素的引用中使用运行时名称查找。This is because one of the key storyboard properties, , uses a run-time name lookup instead of being able to take a reference to a target element. 即使该元素是可访问的代码中的引用，也是如此。This is true even if that element is accessible by reference from the code. 为何需要注册名称的情节提要目标的详细信息，请参阅[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。For more information on why you need to register names for storyboard targets, see [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md). 为内容元素的动画并不常见上控件的动画[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)重点介绍控制方案。Animations for content elements are less common than animations on controls, the [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md) concentrates on control scenarios.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以完全或部分中定义的资源字典[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]通常创建为一个属性元素，并且通常是根元素为任何单个页面或应用程序上。Resource dictionaries that can be defined completely or partially in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] are typically created as a property element, and are typically on the root element for any individual page or for the application. 将在此级别的资源字典便于查找从页面中的各个子元素 （或任何页上，在应用程序的情况下）。Placing the resource dictionary at this level makes it easier to find from individual child elements in the page (or from any page, in the application case). 在大多数应用程序方案中，我们建议作为对象元素使用的资源字典中定义样式或作为外部资源定义整个样式资源可以是自包含 （此方法有助于单独的设计器从开发人员通过将需要编辑物理文件分开的责任职责）。In most application scenarios, we recommend that styles be defined as object elements within a resource dictionary, or be defined as external resources so that the entire style resource can be self-contained (this approach helps separate designer responsibilities from developer responsibilities by separating the physical files that need to be edited). 请注意，此属性返回直接在该元素内声明仅的资源字典。Note that this property returns only the resource dictionary declared directly within that element. 此函数不同于实际资源查找过程中，子元素可以访问任何向上递归搜索每个父元素中定义的资源。This is different than the actual resource lookup process, where a child element can access any of the resources defined in each parent element, searching recursively upwards. 资源在集合中，从代码也可以引用，但请注意资源创建在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]肯定不可访问，直到引起声明该字典的元素。Resources can also be referenced by code from within the collection, but be aware that resources created in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will definitely not be accessible until after is raised by the element that declares the dictionary. 事实上，资源以异步方式分析和甚至不事件是保证可引用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]定义资源。In fact, resources are parsed asynchronously, and not even the event is an assurance that you can reference a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] defined resource. 因此你通常只应访问[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]定义资源作为的一部分运行时代码，或通过其他[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]技术，如样式或特性值的资源扩展引用。For this reason you should generally only access [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] defined resources as part of run-time code, or through other [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] techniques such as styles or resource extension references for attribute values. 通过代码访问资源时，它是实质上等同于从进行的引用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。When you access resources through code, it is essentially equivalent to a reference made from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 基础支持添加、 删除或通过使用代码查询从集合中的资源所需的方法。The underlying supports the methods required to add, remove, or query resources from within the collection by using code. 属性是可以设置以支持以下场景： 完全替换的元素为一个新的或不同的资源集合。The property is settable to support the scenario of completely replacing the resources collection of an element to be a new or different . 请注意，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]所示的语法不包含的元素。Notice that the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax shown does not include an element for the . 这是隐式集合语法; 一个示例可以省略表示集合元素的标记。This is an example of implicit collection syntax; a tag representing the collection element can be omitted. 改为指定为项添加到集合的元素。The elements that are added as items to the collection are specified instead. 有关隐式集合的详细信息和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，请参阅[在详细信息的 XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。For more information about implicit collections and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], see [XAML Syntax In Detail](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md). 一种情况下其中仍显式指定引入合并的字典，这种情况下是否存在通常没有子元素，该元素原样。One case where a is still specified explicitly as an element is if you are introducing a merged dictionary, in which case there are typically no child elements for that . 有关详细信息，请参阅[合并资源字典](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md)。For details, see [Merged Resource Dictionaries](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md). ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreResourceElements**oneOrMoreResourceElements* 一个或多个对象元素，其中每个定义的资源。One or more object elements, each of which defines a resource. 在每个每个资源属性元素必须具有唯一值[X:key 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)，它用作唯一键时将从检索值。Each resource property element within each must have a unique value for the [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md), which serves as the unique key when values are retrieved from the . ## Examples 下面的示例建立集合根元素。The following example establishes a collection on a root element. 是一个典型的选择，因为它是一个少数根元素，以及资源有意义的类通常存储在页面根或更高级别的如应用程序。 is a typical choice because it is one of the few classes that make sense as a root element, and resources are generally stored at the page root or at even higher levels such as in the application. remarks.format: ## Remarks 从主题，或从通常通过在页面或应用程序级别 （隐式样式） 的资源应用于该类型的对象的样式的默认样式通常提供当前样式。The current style is often provided by a default style from theming, or from styles generally applied to objects of that type by resources at page or application level (an implicit style). 此属性不未设置或返回默认值 （主题） 样式，但它返回的隐式样式或显式样式。This property does not set or return default (theme) styles, but it does return the implicit style or an explicit style. 如果存在隐式或显式样式，它并不重要的样式是访问作为资源还是本地定义。In the case of implicit or explicit styles, it does not matter whether the style is accessed as a resource or defined locally. 设置样式有一些限制。Setting the styles has some restrictions. 你可以重置整个到新的属性任何时候，这将强制布局重新组合。You can reset the entire property to a new at any time, which will force a layout recomposition. 但是，只要该样式加载的元素，置于使用应视为密封。However, as soon as that style is placed in use by a loaded element, the should be considered sealed. 尝试对正在使用样式任何单个属性进行更改 (如在集合内的任何内容) 将导致异常引发。Attempting to make a change to any individual property of an in-use style (such as anything within the collection of ) causes an exception to be thrown. 在标记中定义样式被视为一旦加载从资源字典 （对于资源），或包含在页面加载 （对于内联样式），可使用。A style that is defined in markup is considered to be in use as soon as it is loaded from a resource dictionary (for resources), or the page it is contained within is loaded (for inline styles). 是具有特殊优先级依赖项属性。 is a dependency property with special precedence. 本地设置样式通常最高优先级会在运行属性系统。The locally set style generally operates at the highest precedence in the property system. 如果属性系统检查隐式样式为指定该类型的定义资源加载期间在此情况下，为 null。If the is null at this point, during loading the property system checks for implicit styles as defined resources that specify that type. 如果此步骤后，该样式为仍 null 则样式来自默认 （主题） 样式，但默认样式中将不返回属性值。If the style is still null after this step, then the style comes from the default (theme) style, but the default style is not returned in the property value. 请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。See [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是类似于在其他标记属性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ms](~/includes/tlasharptla-ms-md.md)]编程模型，如[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_vba](~/includes/tlasharptla-vba-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]。This property is analogous to Tag properties in other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ms](~/includes/tlasharptla-ms-md.md)] programming models, such as [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_vba](~/includes/tlasharptla-vba-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]. 它旨在提供一个预先存在的空间来存储而不进行强制子类化的应用程序开发人员的有关任何元素的一些基本的自定义信息。It is intended to provide a pre-existing place to store some basic custom information about any element without forcing application developers to subclass. ## XAML 值XAML Values 因为此属性采用对象，你将需要使用以便设置的属性元素用法中的属性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]带已知和内置类型转换器，如字符串对象之外的任何内容。Because this property takes an object, you would need to use the property element usage in order to set the property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] to anything other than an object with a known and built-in type converter, such as a string. 在这种方式中使用的对象通常并不位于标准[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]命名空间，因此可能需要将命名空间映射到外部命名空间，以便作为引入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]元素。Objects used in this way are typically not within the standard [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] namespaces and therefore may require namespace mapping to the external namespace in order to be introduced as [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] elements. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 模板是实际共享的对象，其中仅一次创建模板的内容。Templates are actually shared objects, where the contents of the template are created only once. 因此，如果你获取对来自模板的元素的对象引用，你可能会发现明显的逻辑树无法到达页面根。Therefore, if you obtain an object reference to an element that came from a template, you may find that the apparent logical tree does not reach to the page root. 若要连接到该页面的逻辑树这样的模板引用，则应获取值并继续根据需要该元素树中导航。In order to connect such a template reference to the page's logical tree, you should get the value and continue to navigate that element tree as desired. 将通常为`null`对常见对象，因为如果你通过常用方法的应用程序中获取对象引用从页面外的，该元素可能不根据创建模板。 will frequently be `null` for common objects, because if you have obtained an object reference from out of a page in your application through typical means, that element probably was not created from a template. 情况可能不是`null`应包括处理某些低级别的输入事件，或使用枚举器，可能返回来自模板的元素命中测试、 事件等操作。Cases where might not be `null` would include operations such as hit-testing, event handling for certain low-level input events, or working with enumerators, which may have returned elements that came from templates.
